Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! Features: Unique Reindeer series pocket watch only OFFER by ManChDa. Reindeer and woods pattern, comes with removable chain How to use/set mechanical pocket watch? A. Setting time Pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. B. Winding the watch - Push the crown back into place along the base of the watch and winding up the watch clockwise rotation with 25-30 turns. - The power will be full(Over winding will ultimately break the spring). - Do this one time each day (before sleeping). - Otherwise, it will stop working. Please do not over winding up the watch if you feel the crown is tight.
